name: Edelrid Swift Eco Dry 8.9mm Rope
description:
A fantastic all-rounder, the Swift rope meets testing standards for a single, half or twin rope. The dry treatment meets the UIAA water repellent standards and it's PFC-free. A great option if you're looking for a skinny redpointing rope or for a single rope to use for alpine routes.Thermo Shield treatment gives it excellent handling properties, a supple feel and an impressive strength rating.EcoDry finish makes this rope durably water-repellent and dirt-resistant without the use of PFCs.Meets UIAA standard water-repellent test, meaning this rope is fast-drying, absorbs virtually no water and resists freezing.3D lap coiled so you can use it straight away without kinking or tangling.Meets testing standards to certify it as a single, half or twin.Specs shown are for use as a single rope.When used as a half rope, the specs are as follows:
Dynamic elongation: 30%
Static elongation: 8.6%
Impact force: 6.7kN
UIAA fall rating: 22When used as a twin rope, the specs are as follows (based on tests with 2 strands):
Dynamic elongation: 28%
Static elongation: 5.3%
Impact force: 10.4kN
UIAA fall rating: 22

        Sustainability
